repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

did.physloc: Portions located in offsite storage; prior notification required for access.

acqinfo.p: The record group came from the organization (donor no. 5113).

accruals.p: No further additions to the papers are expected.

accessrestrict.p: The record group is open to research.

userestrict.p: Copyright is held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Michigan-Ohio Regional Education Laboratory records, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: The Michigan-Ohio Regional Education Laboratory was established in 1966. The over-all goal of the organization "was to improve the quality of education for children, youth, and teachers in the region by sustaining and expanding research, program development, demonstration, dissemination, and utilization activities."

scopecontent.p: The record group includes minutes of board of directors, office files, tapes of educational programs and talks, and reports and publications.

did.unittitle: Minutes of the Board of Directors
